page.title: 20CORNISH WRESTLING
page.content: Wrestlers are matched at particular weights and tournaments take place all over Cornwall throughout the summer to decide on a Cornish champion at each particular weight. Catchweight contests are also held and open competitions for children. Cornish wrestling has much in common with Breton wrestling and both share the same Celtic origins. Cornish wrestlers now regularly attend Celtic festivals in Brittany and Breton wrestlers have visited Cornwall to take part in tournaments. The revival in Cornish wrestling has gone side by side with the increasing interest in the Celtic origins and customs of Cornwall.
